title: Silicon Nanowires Incorporated Efficient and Flexible PEDOT:PSS/Silicon Hybrid Solar Cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00439F, Paper
Deepak Sharma, Ruchi K Sharma, Avritti Srivastava, Vamsi K. Komarala, P. Prathap, Arman Ahnood, Sanjay Kumar Srivastava
The global demand for renewable energy sources has intensified the quest for innovative and inexpensive solar cell technologies. Employing thin crystalline silicon (c-Si) is of great interest in these advancements....
